Field Detail

SEARCH_INDEX_STATE

public static final ConfigProperty<com.complexible.stardog.search.SearchIndexValidState> SEARCH_INDEX_STATE
Option to store the state of the search index associated to the DB

SEARCH_REINDEX_IN_TX

public static final String SEARCH_REINDEX_IN_TX
Option value for specifying that the search re-indexing should take place synchronously, that is, within the transaction in which the changes occur. When the reindex option has this value, the transaction cannot complete without the search re-index completing.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SEARCH_REINDEX_OUTSIDE_TX

public static final String SEARCH_REINDEX_OUTSIDE_TX
Option value for specifying that the search re-indexing should take place asynchronously outside of the transaction. If there is a change to the RDF index in a transaction w/ a search index using this option, on commit a job will be dispatched that will do the search re-indexing asynchronously from the transaction completion; that is, the tx will complete without re-indexing being complete. So there is a time where the search index is out of sync with the RDF index, thus you will only want to use this option if that is ok wrt to your use case.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SEARCH_REINDEX_MODE

public static final ConfigProperty<String> SEARCH_REINDEX_MODE
Option to store the search reindex mode associated to the DB. This should be either SEARCH_REINDEX_IN_TX for indexing as part of a transaction, SEARCH_REINDEX_OUTSIDE_TX for re-indexing outside a transaction, that is, asynchronously after the transaction has successfully committed, or a valid cron expression. In the latter case, the search index will be updated regularly based on the cron expression.

public SearchOptions()
